code: @Manual{,   title = {rchk0: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets},   author = {Shushun Ren},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/Geomisgytree/rchk0}, }

what: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: spec-driven data validation platform designed clinical trial datasets. Built help study leads automatically detect, track, resolve data issues across multiple raw data transfers. Modular, extensible, ready deployment.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: ✅ Spec-Driven Configuration: Study leads define logic via Excel spec file—coding required. 🔍 Automated Checkpoints: Predefined custom checks run across raw datasets. 📊 Excel Output: Issues logged structured Excel tabs status tracking. 🔁 Multi-Run Support: Handles repeated raw data transfers versioned issue logs. 🧠 Modular Architecture: Easily extendable new studies without changing core logic. 🖥️ Optional Shiny UI: non-technical users run checks view results interactively.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
code: kiac-data-tracker/ ├── README.md                  # 项目说明文档 ├── .gitignore                 # 忽略文件配置 ├── spec_template.xlsx         # 通用 spec 模板供 study lead 使用 ├── config/                    # 每个 study 的 spec 文件 │   └── J3K-MC-KIAC_spec.xlsx ├── sample_data/               # 示例 raw data 和 spec 文件 │   ├── demo_spec.xlsx │   └── raw_data.sas7bdat ├── driver/                    # 主 driver 脚本 │   └── run_tracker.R ├── functions/                 # 所有功能函数模块 │   ├── preprocessing.R │   ├── checkpoints.R │   ├── excel_writer.R │   └── utils.R ├── shiny_ui/                  # 可选的 Shiny 界面代码 │   └── app.R ├── tests/                     # 单元测试脚本（推荐使用 testthat） │   └── test_checkpoints.R ├── logs/                      # 每次运行的日志记录 │   └── run_log_20250920.txt ├── output/                    # 生成的 Excel 输出（不纳入 Git） └── .github/                   # GitHub Actions 自动化配置     └── workflows/         └── ci.yml             # CI/CD 流程定义

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
code: git clone https://github.com/yourusername/kiac-data-tracker.git cd kiac-data-tracker

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
code: install.packages(c(   "dplyr", "openxlsx", "haven",    "purrr", "stringr", "readxl" ))

what: 3. Prepare your spec and raw data
title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Use spec_template.xlsx starting point. Place raw.sas7bdat files designated data folder.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: ReadMe: Overview run parameter settings Issue Log: Cumulative issue tracking table Dataset Tabs: Detailed issue records dataset Add screenshots demo video links illustrate output.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Configuration Code: study-specific logic resides spec file. Modular Design: function independently testable reusable. User-Centric: Study leads can run checks without writing code. Scalability: Supports versioned runs, state tracking, new studies minimal changes.

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Migrate core logic Python (pandas + openpyxl). Replace Excel-based issue tracking SQLite. Integrate Airflow DAG scheduled runs. Deploy Shiny UI RStudio Connect Posit Workbench. Package toolkit R library (kiacTracker).

title: Raw Data Issue Tracker for Clinical Datasets
text: Shushun Ren Statistical programmer / Biostatistician / Data Engineer · OMSCS Candidate 🔗 LinkedIn 📧 shushunr@umich.edu
